Title: CCI Explorer (An alternative to .NET Reflector)
Description:
CCI Explorer is an alternative to RedGate Reflector.
It use the Microsoft Common Compiler Infrastructure to decompil and view source executable code.

The application is writing in WPF and use the MVVM pattern.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
CCI Explorer is an alternative to RedGate Reflector.
It use the Microsoft Common Compiler Infrastructure to decompil and view source executable code.

The application is writing in WPF and use the MVVM pattern.



Current features :
  • TreeView exploration
  • C# decompilation

Planned features :
  • Navigation from type to type
  • Load assembly from GAC
  • PRISM based framework for extensibility
  • Visual Basic decompilation
  • IL decompilation

Currently, i'm looking for contributors to work on this project.

This project has been created and managed by Gilles TOURREAU (http://gilles.tourreau.fr), an MVP C#.
